net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events

Class KeyEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.Event
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.KeyEvent

  • public class KeyEvent
extends Event
    Class used when a KeyListener instance has an been notified of an event. Keeps track of the key code, character, and a description of the key that caused the event.
    Since:
    May 10, 2013 at 7:07:55 AM, v0.2
    Version:
    May 10, 2013 at 7:07:55 AM, v0.2
    Author:
    bmsteffaniak

      char getCharacter()
      Get the character that the KeyEvent was created with.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Get the String representation of the key that caused the Event.
      int getKeyCode()
      Get the code that refers to the specific key that caused the Event.
